snippet.title: Paper Mario: Color Splash Trailer – The Adventure Unfolds
snippet.description:
Join Mario as he investigates the mystery of Prism Island and its vanishing colors

Paper Mario: Color Splash is available now! http://papermario.nintendo.com/

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com

Like Nintendo on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Nintendo
